title: The Life & Loves of Elizabeth Taylor | “Hello, My Name is Elizabeth and I’m an Addict” | 4
description:
Richard Burton and Elizabeth Taylor can’t be apart. But they can’t stop drinking when they’re together. They’re going to have to choose: their love or their sobriety.
